channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rachel Maddow Blasts Republicans For Showing Up At Trump’s Trial To Attack Judicial System
item.description: Rachel Maddow blasted Republicans for showing up at Trump's trial and attempting to damage or destroy the judicial system.

item.title: In Spite of Border Crisis Calls for Amnesty Continue
item.description: The border crisis and mass illegal migration have exceeded all historical records. In Fiscal Year 2023, over 3.2 million illegal aliens were encountered nationwide, and we are on track to exceed even that unprecedented annual figure this fiscal year. To read the rest of the article click here The post In Spite of Border Crisis Calls for Amnesty Continue appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Michael Cohen Names Katy Tur As One Of His Close Journalists For Trump
item.description: Michael Cohen outed MSNBC's Katy Tur as one of the journalists with whom he had a close relationship and fed Trump stories.

item.title: Border County Sees 5,000 Percent Increase in Prosecutions During Biden’s Border Crisis
item.description: In Kinney County, Texas, a stark example of the direct consequences of open-borders policies under the Biden administration is unfolding. To read the rest of the article click here The post Border County Sees 5,000 Percent Increase in Prosecutions During Biden’s Border Crisis appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Corporate Media Ignores The Stock Market Hitting Historic 40,000 Under Biden
item.description: For the first time in history, the Dow Jones Industrial Average hit 40,000. It happened under Joe Biden, and some of the biggest corporate media outlets are ignoring it.

item.title: This May Be the Most Far-Flung Argument Yet to Reward Illegal Aliens
item.description: Illegal aliens can’t legally drive in Missouri. Legislation passed in 2009 specifies that applicants for driver’s licenses must be U.S. citizens, or have proof of lawful presence in the United States. Admirably, Missouri is holding fast against trends to the contrary. To read the rest of the article click here The post This May Be the Most Far-Flung Argument Yet to Reward Illegal Aliens appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Trump’s Lawyer Spins Out Of Control And Can’t Break Cohen’s Jury Connection
item.description: Trump's lawyer Todd Blanche is reportedly going on off on long speeches to please his client, while Michael Cohen and the jury stay connected.

item.title: UK Study Shows Mass Immigration Will NOT Help the Economy
item.description: Supporters of open borders often claim there will be major economic gains from relaxed border and immigration policies. To read the rest of the article click here The post UK Study Shows Mass Immigration Will NOT Help the Economy appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Trump Appears To Be Using Lauren Boebert To Violate Gag Order
item.description: Rep. Lauren Boebert showed up in court with Trump, and she is posting on line what appears to be instructions on violating the gag order.

item.title: What Do We Want? Everything! Migrants Send List of Demands to Denver City Officials
item.description: As the surge of illegal immigration began to unfold at the start of the Biden administration, the city of Denver, Colorado – or at least the politicians who run the city and state – decided that what most Americans see as a crisis would be a great opportunity for them to virtue signal. To read [...] The post What Do We Want? Everything! Migrants Send List of Demands to Denver City Officials appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
